oce
***


Description
===========

Oracle Content and Experience is a cloud-based content hub to drive
omni-channel content management and accelerate experience delivery


Available Commands
==================

* oce-instance

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list
